title: tAyumAnavan
sahitya:
tAyumAnavan sattiyat-tandaiyum AnAn sEyum AyinAn sevviya tOzhanum AnAn


anupallavi

  Ayum anbarukk-anaittumAm amara shuddhAnmA sAyirAm enum sadgurunAthanaip-paNivOm


caraNam    yAnuLEn bhayamEdena abhayam IndiDuvAn UnuyirgaLin iDargaLai uDanuDan kaLaivAn
tEnum pAlum pOl iniyavan sIraDip-perumAn mOnamAyinEn avan aruLuNDa nAL mudalE
